section_title: 14d13 - Services and other items to be furnished under a single contract.
text:
The SCA applies only where a
contract as a whole is principally for the furnishing of services as opposed to
line items for specific work in a contract. The SCA reference to “bid
specification” refers to the advertised specifications in a solicitation for bids
rather than a separate line item or work requirement within a contract. (See 29
C.F.R. 4.132.)
html: The SCA applies only where a contract as a whole is principally for the furnishing of services as opposed to line items for specific work in a contract. The SCA reference to “bid specification” refers to the advertised specifications in a solicitation for bids rather than a separate line item or work requirement within a contract. (See 29 C.F.R. 4.132.)
